channel.title: BUbreakingSectionTwo
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingSectionTwo, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘The Sell America Trade’: Who’s behind the sinking of the U.S. dollar
item.description: It's not China or Japan. It's everyone.

item.title: A Coastal New England Town’s ‘Ornery’ Vandal: A Woodpecker
item.description: More than 20 vehicles in a town on Cape Ann, Mass., have been damaged by a woodpecker in mating season. “You still see him out here,” one resident sai...

item.title: Elon Musk Warns China’s Rare Earth Restrictions May Delay Tesla Robots
item.description: China’s halt this month on exports of magnets containing heavy rare earth metals has affected Tesla’s plans to manufacture Optimus robots.

item.title: Markets open sharply higher after Trump softens on China and says he has ‘no intention to fire’ Fed Chair Jerome Powell
item.description: All major indices show substantial early gains.

item.title: Scott Bessent Accuses IMF and World Bank of ‘Mission Creep’
item.description: Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent argued in a speech that the multilateral economic institutions have veered away from their missions.

item.title: Elon Musk’s robotaxi could be its final all new EV: ‘The reality is in the future most people are not going to buy cars’
item.description: Tesla execs said new cars launching this year will just be more affordable derivatives of existing cars, dashing investor hopes for all new models.

item.title: Ex-OpenAI employees sign open letter to California AG: For-profit pivot poses ‘palpable threat’ to nonprofit mission
item.description: In a new letter to the California and Delaware attorneys general, former OpenAI insiders and AI luminaries warn the company’s restructuring threatens ...

item.title: ‘Don’t fight the Oval Office’: Investors are finally taking Trump seriously and it’s causing a volatility spike in markets as they try to figure out his next move
item.description: Volatility has plagued stocks in recent months and major indexes are down since Trump’s election in November.

item.title: Killing of Civilians Near Pahalgam in Kashmir Shatters Illusion of Calm
item.description: India had claimed in recent years that its heavy-handed approach had brought peace to the long-restive region. The attack on Tuesday showed that wasn’...

item.title: Pope Francis’ Coffin Is Moved to St. Peter’s Basilica to Lie in State
item.description: Crowds flocked to pay their respects and bid farewell to the pontiff, who died on Monday at the age of 88.

item.title: Will Canada’s Next Prime Minister Solve the Million-Dollar Housing Crisis?
item.description: Soaring housing costs, with many homes nearing $1 million, have sparked an exodus from cities like Vancouver, and Canadians want their next prime mini...

item.title: The Faithful Pay Their Respects as Pope Francis’ Coffin Lies in State
item.description: The late Pope’s body was brought into St. Peter’s Basilica on Wednesday and will lie in state for three days before his funeral on Saturday.

item.title: Map: 6.2-Magnitude Earthquake Strikes Near Turkey
item.description: View the location of the quake’s epicenter and shake area.

item.title: Pope Francis’ Coffin Is Moved to St. Peter’s Basilica to Lie in State
item.description: Crowds flocked to pay their respects and bid farewell to the pontiff, who died on Monday at the age of 88.
